data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Ursula: Where did you get that strange soda?
Kathy: They're ____ them ____ outside ____ the ____ station. This ____ tastes ____ mango ____ coconut. Do ____ want ____ try ____?
Ursula: No thanks; that one sounds too unusual for my tastes.
data.partBlankContent:
Ursula: Where did you get that strange soda?
Kathy: They're giv___ them o__ outside o_ the tr___ station. This o__ tastes li__ mango a__ coconut. Do y__ want t_ try i_?
Ursula: No thanks; that one sounds too unusual for my tastes.
data.fullContent: Ursula: Where did you get that strange soda? Kathy: They're giving them out outside of the train station. This one tastes like mango and coconut. Do you want to try it? Ursula: No thanks; that one sounds too unusual for my tastes.
data.answer: 乌苏拉：你从哪儿弄到这种奇怪的汽水？ 卡西：他们在火车站外分发的。这个尝起来像芒果和椰子。你想试试吗？ 厄休拉：不，谢谢；这个听起来太不寻常了。
